availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, attorney. Pennsylvania native. Married to Virginia R. Gilpin Sampson in Jefferson County, Kentucky on May 18, 1848. Father of Ida Sampson, Mollie Sampson and John Sampson. Attorney in Barren County, Kentucky in 1850. Attorney in Barren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, First Division, p. 402B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 891.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482448, p.328 of 729 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "William Sampson (1818-1866)," Memorial #146411708 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146411708 (accessed October 8, 2019).
